notes.text:
This update for zziplib fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2024-39134: Fixed a stack buffer overflow via the __zzip_fetch_disk_trailer() (bsc#1227178)
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: A Stack Buffer Overflow vulnerability in zziplibv 0.13.77 allows attackers to cause a denial of service via the __zzip_fetch_disk_trailer() function at /zzip/zip.c.
notes.title: CVE description
